paste.description: bash script to find all ZeroMe users. In case you thought you were anonymous, allow me to correct that completely erroneous notion.
paste.body:
#!/bin/bash
#timestamp: 1493170981 +UNIX

#Find all ZeroMe users, list their hubs:pubkeys:username@certissuer
#prints to stdout

#init vars, change as needed
init_vars()
{
#change this to your ZeroNet/data dir.
ZDATDIR=./
}

find_users() 
{ 
    for file in $(find "${ZDATDIR}/${1}/data/users/" -iname content.json);
    do
        local firstkey=${file%/*};
        local truekey=${firstkey##*/};
        sed -n '/cert_user_id/s@.*: "\([^"]\+\)".*'@${hub}:${truekey}:\\1@p "${file}";
    done
}

#this list was collated from http://127.0.0.1:43110/0hub.bit/
list_hubs()
{
cat << _EOF_
1BLueGvui1GdbtsjcKqCf4F67uKfritG49#BlueHub
1GrEenUGRWnzaNZjR3XsQa6dQgdPDTyt7i#GreenHub
1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL#RedHub
1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v#OrangeHub
18FheQ1v3bz4iv5yx8hr9hg5W5BJ8WNJ8d#YellowHub
12h51ug6CcntU2aiBjhP8Ns2e5VypbWWtv#KaffieHub
1ARSTRDgMSH2E81pcZCbaEq28TZ72Levxh#OrangeIsTheNewBlack Hub
16bNGdxFkGWGnCEfVue3w4CSp3Ew2hcyBB#Trump 2016
12rTbtzcEZH7RiVfShBB3qhoe3rfwbpm8S#Bitcoin
1JUDmCT4UCSdnPsJAHBoXNkDS61Y31Ue52#Bot Hub
1Gb25pK7XqrgnBYjhHLGBjEYURg2MhbJCq#Lime hub
1HNf26SK9Hi9LES1kUKg6r36hDwhBdNBKM#hi hub
1GnSLuqqmB8oRAJ4SK4hvzt6Jo1qAnEbXn#YellowHub
149fpM31r6YUc7WZ1m28Lq6Ef3zwdBFKBq#PolskiHub
1KNmG5rJUGhgUJGFbLkv2B5isaqu9PrZqi#AmethystHub
1MATTnuthfsvTUqEwtvTR6nMiLmtqGXyfv#Religion
15mV5T1R1wxg3E1FPsvZw19bw6QzvRREfn#Hub EspaÃ±ol
12cm58PYhaSaHUkKgsbf62Rg9Db5DukWYd#IPFS Hub
1CiGGh6RrTtaTJfutVKUrfURsP5J4stJDk#Anarcho Capitalism
185yXNL48LTZyKfNo6WgyKshtMgcV3mecL#Icf20s Hub
1AbRRDveQD5EFtmXxBqQfS1guUWXxytMJZ#torrents Hub
1D7xb8vwnWUYSXziENcnoi3meD5Gk2xgFj#True red hub
1LQeBa8AgXPd9YXyfTGm9FbcJZTM4p1vgY#The Great Dane Hub
1CouTPX7rK6cyffPCyyxttdZhB1u7NPtqz#Asia
1White24UrrwQrD86o6Vrc1apgZ1x1o51#WhiteHub
1ABFCaadiEa3bFNzN3RcCZSsviqMNTbz3m#Free Hub
_EOF_
}

#begin ops
init_vars

ls "${ZDATDIR}" | sed -n -f <(list_hubs | sed 's@\(.*\)#.*@/\1/p@') | while read hub; do find_users ${hub}; done
